text:
Carlos Reiche (aka Karl F. Reiche) was a German Botanist.
He took his doctorate at the University of Leipzig, and was a professor at the University of Dresden. He worked at the National Museum of Chile, being director of Department of Botany. He held a profesorship in Mexico, then lived in Monaco, went back briefly to Mexico, and returned to Germany
Works.
[http://biblioteca.cchc.cl/datafiles/32560-2.pdf Rafael Sagredo Baeza. –1ª ed..– Santiago de Chile: Cámara chilena de la construcción: Pontificia Universidad Católica de Chile: Dirección de Bibliotecas, Archivos y Museos, C2013.] Translated by Gualterio Looser.
